description: Public Services and Procurement Canada’s (PSPC) Client and Case Relationship Management (CCRM) Initiative...
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title and Identification

**Tender Title**: Strategic Advisory, Business Consulting, and Change Management Services
**Reference Number**: WS4560937720-Doc4561058004
**Amendment Number**: 13
**Solicitation Number**: WS4560937720
**Publication Date**: May 10, 2024

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: July 5, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: July 8, 2024, and March 31, 2025
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Description

This tender solicitation invites qualified firms to provide strategic advisory, business consulting, and change management services for the modernization of the case management system and ongoing analysis for Public Services and Procurement Canada's Client and Case Relationship Management (CCRM) Initiative. The requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS.

### Important Information

* The tender closing time has been modified. Please disregard the original closing time and ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submissions are received by July 5, 2024, at 14:00 EDT.
* Only Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS may participate in this tender.
* The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Interested parties may contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA for more information.

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Brian Steele, Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Email**: [brian.steele@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.steele@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Location**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Trade Agreements and Categories

* This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The categories for this tender are:
	+ Strategic Planning Consultation Services (80101504)
	+ Business Intelligence Consulting Services (80101508)

### Tender Status

The current tender status is Expiré (Expired). This tender announcement is for informational purposes only
